name: Linux Promotional Plugin
author: Timothy Arceri

sections.description:
The Linux Promotional Plugin is a plugin that shows a informative message alerting Windows and Mac users about the advantages of Linux, and providing links to choosen distros.

You can choose from 2 types of promotions:

  • TOP, a discreet top bar
  • FULL, a fullscreen promotional message

See the new Linux Promotional Plugin for further information.

All suggestions for improvements are welcome!

Localization

If you want to help localizing this plugin to your language, read this article at WordPress Codex, any help will be welcomed!!!

Author

Timothyja. owner of the ITSqueeze blog
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install it through the admin interface
  2. Choose the type of promotion in the options page and save
  3. DONE!
sections.faq:
Questions?

Any questions go to the plugin homepage and leave a comment.
